verbose_text: Systemic administration of the nanodrug once a week over 2 weeks induced considerable levels of necrosis and apoptosis in the tumors as a result of the siBIRC5 mediated inhibition of the antiapoptotic survivin protooncogene, translating into a significant decrease in tumor growth rate.
evidence: result of the siBIRC5-mediated inhibition of the antiapoptotic survivin protooncogene
